question: Asia’s first 5th Generation - VR based Advanced Driver Training simulator centre launched at which city?
explanation: Asia’s first 5th Generation – Virtual Reality based Advanced Driver Training Simulator Centre was launched at the Automobile Association of Southern India Centre (AASI), Chennai. In the first 6 months, AASI will train 200 Ambulance drivers free of cost, under ‘Safe Drivers Campaign’. In the first 6 months, AASI will train 200 Ambulance drivers free of cost under \'Safe Drivers Campaign\'. The simulator was ideated, designed and developed by Chennai based Red Chariots Technologies Pvt Ltd.
